explanation: [0-0] On a beach, a young man in a red polka dot shirt is holding the hand of a young woman in a black dress. To the right, a man in black stands next to a camel. The camel is kneeling on the sand with its neck straight and head slightly raised. There are some colorful decorations on the camel's back.

[0-4] The young man in the red polka dot shirt then pulls the hand of the young woman in the black dress and walks towards the camel on the right. The woman in the black dress keeps trying to back away, not wanting to go over. Then, the young man in the red polka dot shirt holds the arms of the young woman in the black dress with both hands and walks her to the camel. As they move to the right, the surrounding scenery moves to the left.

[4-6] The young man in the red polka dot shirt and the young woman in the black dress then arrive next to the camel. The man in black stands beside the camel, watching their movements. The camel has a large red seat with yellow lace decoration on its back. Then, the young man in the red polka dot shirt supports the young woman's back with his hand and leads her to the camel's seat. After that, the man moves from behind the woman to her right side and extends his right hand. The young woman in the black dress grabs the armrest of the seat and sits down on the seat on top of the camel.

[6-13] The camera then zooms in on the camel's seat. The young woman in the black dress is sitting on the seat, and the young man in the red polka dot shirt is standing in front of the camel, holding the front handlebar and backrest of the seat with both hands. He then runs to the other side of the camel, lifts his right leg, and straddles the seat on the camel, sitting in front of the young woman in the black dress.
